answerText: "Two Concepts of Liberty"[10] "Two Concepts of Liberty" was written by this Russian philosopher, who put his opposition to tyranny into practice by smuggling Dr. Zhivago out of the USSR. He also wrote "The Hedgehog and the Fox."
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | UVA A + OSU A | 15 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This essay argues that "Kant's individualism" can often lead to a "pure totalitarian doctrine" in its fifth section, "The Temple of Sarastro." For 10 points each: [10] Name this Oxford lecture published in 1958, which distinguishes between "positive" and "negative" ideas about freedom.
